description.value: The shaman can call on the ancient allies of her ancestors to physically appear and assist her, even if they have moved on to new roles in the cosmos. Once per day as a standard action, the shaman can cast @Compendium[pf1.spells.gfvnfa5k1tnpvg8v]{Planar Ally}. Although there is no cost to use the spelllike ability, the planar ally demands payment for services it performs as normal for the spell.
